Event

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Event.EventManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Manages all operations involving Events.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getEventsByDate

        public java.util.List<Event> getEventsByDate(java.time.LocalDateTime dttm)
        Get the events that are scheduled on this date time
        Parameters:
        dttm - the date and time to get Events from
        Returns:
        a List of Events that are scheduled on this date time

      • getEventsByName

        public java.util.List<Event> getEventsByName(java.lang.String eventName)
        Returns all events with name eventName ignoring case. Since Event names aren't unique we return a list of all events with that name.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The name of the event the method is looking for.
        Returns:
        All events that have the same name as eventName ignoring case.

      • getCurrentEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getCurrentEvents(java.time.LocalDateTime currentTime)
        Returns an all events that are currently occuring.
        Returns:
        All events that whos dttmStart has already passed but their dttmEnd has not.

      • getFutureEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getFutureEvents(java.time.LocalDateTime currentTime)
        Returns an all events that have not occured and are occuring in the future.
        Returns:
        All events that whos dttmStart has not already passed.

      • getPreviousEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getPreviousEvents(java.time.LocalDateTime currentTime)
        Returns an all events that have already occured.
        Returns:
        All events that whos dttmEnd has already passed.

      • editEventDttmById

        public void editEventDttmById(java.lang.String id,
                              java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                              java.time.LocalDateTime end)
                       throws EndDateBeforeStartDateException,
                              ObjectNotFoundException
        Allows editing of start and endtime of
        Parameters:
        id - the Id of the event to edit
        start - the new start time
        end - the new end time
        Throws:
        EndDateBeforeStartDateException - thrown if the event ends before it starts
        ObjectNotFoundException - Thrown if the event to be editted does not exist

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(Event event)
        Adds an Event.Event to events using the event Id as the key.
        Parameters:
        event - The Event.Event that will be added to Events.

      • getEventsByIds

        public java.util.List<Event> getEventsByIds(java.util.List<java.lang.String> eventIds)
                                     throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Pass in a list of Event Id's and get back a list of Event objects with those Id's.
        Parameters:
        eventIds - The list of event ids that will be found.
        Returns:
        A list of Event whos id's are in eventIds.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - If an id doesnt exist the method throws an error.

      • getEventIdsByEvents

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEventIdsByEvents(java.util.List<Event> events)
        Pass in a list of Events and get back a list of Event Id's.
        Parameters:
        events - The list of events
        Returns:
        The list of event ids corresponding to those lists

      • getEventById

        public Event getEventById(java.lang.String id)
                   throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Returns the Event.Event who's Id is id.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique Id of the event that will be returned.
        Returns:
        The Event.Event whose Id is id.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException

      • getAllEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getAllEvents()
        Return all of the Events that this manager is storing.
        Returns:
        All events that the Event.Event manager has.
